SELECT r.bedroom_id , r.apartment_id , r.bedroom_name,r.status,r.total_bed FROM ( SELECT tt.*, ROWNUM AS rowno FROM ( select bedroom_id , apartment_id , bedroom_name,status,total_bed from bedroom where 1=1 order by bedroom_name
)tt WHERE #{pageSize}*#{pageNo} >=ROWNUM ) r WHERE r.rowno >= #{pageSize}*(#{pageNo}-1) +1
